text: Na Nnungu Avêle Na Dimongo Dyammalele43:14 Apano pàlembwije “El-Shadai.” Mana la El-Shadai lola chitabu cha Ntandiliko 17:1. an'jalilange mwenu, aneyo munu ammikilange chididi uchinga anneke Simeoni na Benjamini uchinga vauye pamo na mwenu. Ikàva lasima nangu kuvakoha anavangu, bahi nanga chinu!”
